link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: "Exposure to CCPs" = "Exposure to capital of CCPs" + "Exposure to default fund contribution of CCPs" + "Other Exposure to CCPs"

"Total on-balance sheet exposure" = "Domestic Sovereign" + "Foreign Sovereign" + "Banks incorporated in India and foreign bank branches in India" + "Foreign banks+Domestic Public Sector Entities" + "Foreign Public Sector Entities" + "Primary Dealers" + "Corporates" + "Exposure to CCPs" + "All other exposures not included above-Balance sheet assets deducted from Tier 1 capital and not reckoned for exposure measure above"- "Fiduciary assets"

"Off-balance sheet items with a 10% credit conversion factor" = "Unconditionally cancellable credit cards commitments" + "Other unconditionally cancellable commitments" + "Other OBS items with a 10% CCF for leverage ratio"

"Total off-balance sheet items" = "Off-balance sheet items with a 10% credit conversion factor for leverage ratio, of which:" + "Off-balance sheet items with 20% credit conversion factor" + "Off-balance sheet items with 50% credit conversion factor" + "Off-balance sheet items with 100% credit conversion factor"
It should be calculated by adding credit derivatives (protection sold), credit derivatives (protection bought) and financial derivatives.
It should be calculated by adding exposure to QCCPs, Non-QCCPs, due to non-centrally cleared derivatives and Other Exposures.
"Adjusted effective notional amount of written credit derivatives" = "Effective notional amount of written credit derivatives" - "Less: Any negative change in fair value"
"Net adjusted effective notional amount of written credit derivatives" = "Adjusted effective notional amount of written credit derivatives" - "Less: credit derivatives bought (same reference name)"

"Sub-total for written credit derivatives" = "Net adjusted effective notional amount of written credit derivatives" - "Less: Any deduction, if required, for adjustment of PFE amount relating to written credit derivatives"

"Sub-total for Replacement Cost" = "Sum of [{(i)+(ii)+(iii)} OR {a + b + c +d}] or Total credit and financial derivatives" - "Exempted CCP leg of client-cleared trade exposures" + "Gross up for derivative collateral provided where deducted from the Balance sheet" - "Less: Eligible cash variation margin received in derivative exposures" - "Less: Receivable assets for cash variation margin provided in derivative exposures"
"Sub-total for Potential Future Exposure" = "Sum of [{(i)+(ii)+(iii)} OR {a + b + c +d}] or Total credit and financial derivatives" - "Exempted CCP leg of client-cleared trade exposures"
"Total derivative exposure" = "Sub-total for written credit derivatives" + "Sub-total for Replacement Cost" + "Sub-total for Potential Future Exposure"
"Total gross SFT assets" = "Gross SFT assets" + "Adjustments for SFT sales accounting transactions"
Exposure amount should be calculated by multiplying notional principal with CCF factor.
"Netted amounts of gross SFT assets" = "Total Gross SFT Assets" - "Netted amounts of cash payables and cash receivables of gross SFT assets"
"Gross CCR exposure for SFT assets" = "exposure to QCCPs" + "exposure to Non-QCCPs" + "exposure due to other SFTs"
"Amount of CCR exposure after applying netting, if applicable" = "exposure to QCCPs"
"CCR exposure for SFT assets" = "Exposure to Non-QCCPs" + "exposure due to other SFTs + "amount of CCR exposure after applying netting"

"Agent transaction exposure" = "Exposure due to guarantee / indemnity provided for the difference between value of security or cash and value of collateral" + "Further exposure beyond the guarantee / indemnity provided i.e. equal to the full amount of security or cash, if the bank is economically exposed to the underlying security or cash"
"Total Securities Financing Transactions (SFTs) Exposures" = "Netted amounts of gross SFT assets" + "Sub-total - CCR exposure for SFT assets" + "Agent transaction exposure"
"Total Exposures" = "Total on-balance sheet exposure" + Exposure amount to "Total off-balance sheet items" + "Total derivative exposure" + "Total Securities Financing Transactions (SFTs) Exposures"
"Basel III Leverage Ratio (Quarter End Position)" = "Tier 1 capital" / "Total exposures"

"credit derivatives (protection sold)" + "credit derivatives (protection bought)" + "financial derivatives" = "exposure to QCCPs (initial margin should be reported along with PFE)" + "exposure to Non-QCCPs" + "exposure due to non-centrally cleared derivatives" + "Other Exposures"

"Gross SFT assets (with no recognition of any netting other than novation with QCCPs)" + "adjustments for SFT sales accounting transactions" = sum of "exposure to QCCPs" + "exposure to Non-QCCPs" + "Exposure to due to other SFTs"
"Exposure to QCCPs under Gross CCR exposure for SFT" >= "exposure to QCCPs under Amount of CCR exposure after applying netting"
"Netted amounts of cash payables and cash receivables of gross SFT assets" has to be a absolute value only.
"Total exposures" is a mandatory field.
